protocol: [datasize]|[jsondata] -> size of message , delimiter | , command compiled as json data like this:{"command": "COMMAND_EXAMPLE", "args": [5, 10]}

take_screenshot.description: Takes screenshot of server and sends it back.

upload_file.description: Gets file content and path. The function creates in the server in the path given the file with the file content given and returns if succeeded.

download_file.description: Gets path of file in the server and if exists returns the content of the file and if succeeded.

import_module.description: Imports module given by the client if not already imported.

update_functions.description: Update functions ,receives json file of function data. json example: {"command" : ["name", "arg1", "arg2"],"function_name":"name_example" ,"description": "description of function, params and more...", "code": "function code"}
